Y’know what I JUST realized?
I don’t have to be all things to all people.
For my ENTIRE life if someone—ANYONE had a problem or desire, I’ve believed it was my JOB to fix and/or help.
I can’t anymore.
Life is tough for everyone — INCLUDING me.

A quick word about spoilers:
Life is tough for everyone. Many of us use entertainment to escape from the fresh hell life has become. If you’ve enjoyed a show or movie — or even if you haven’t — please don’t be the person who ruins a twist for another.
That person is an ass.
